Key Match Events: India clinched the three T20I-match series against Sri Lanka by 3-0
The match ended in a SUPER OVER
Suryakumar Yadav slammed a FOUR on the first delivery of the Super OVER to win the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed due to rain
Others: India scored 137 runs in 20 overs after losing 9 wickets
For India, Shubman Gill scored 39 off 37 balls
For Sri Lanka, Maheesh Theekshana took three wickets
